titleStmt.title: A postscript to the Observators first volume, or, The answer of Miles Prance to several of those papers wherein he finds himself most traduced and slandered with some notes to be added to Observator Numb. 8 of the 2d volumn [sic].
titleStmt.author: Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and are to be sold by R. Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
